title: Coraline
description: A girl discovers a secret door to an eerie alternate world that mirrors her own.

title: Monster House
description: Three kids discover that a creepy house in their neighborhood is actually alive.

title: ParaNorman
description: A boy who can talk to ghosts must save his town from zombies and a centuries-old curse.

title: Frankenweenie
description: A young boy brings his beloved dog back to life, with spooky consequences.

title: Hotel Transylvania
description: Dracula runs a hotel for monsters, but things get chaotic when a human visits.

description: The spooky Addams family faces challenges in a world that doesnâ€™t understand them.

title: Corpse Bride
description: A shy groom accidentally proposes to a dead bride in the underworld.

title: Scooby-Doo on Zombie Island
description: The gang reunites to solve a mystery involving real zombies on a spooky island.

title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
description: Jack Skellington discovers Christmas and tries to bring it to Halloween Town.

title: Monster Family
description: A family gets turned into monsters by a witch and must find a way to reverse the curse.
